Summary: UFO sighting over Cordova Bay in Victoria BC Octob
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting in an outdoor hot tub facing east at approx 330pm with a friendwho faced North. I saw a BRIGHT light fly straight down from out of the skytoward the ground, then take an immediate right angle and disappeared behind asmall island, close to the ground. There are many small islands in that area.This light travelled faster than any other light Ive ever seen. I was shockedyet calm and wondered what I saw.I have had many other UFO experiences, anti-gravity, out-of-body experiences,telepathy, remote viewing, interrogations by US man inviting me to join peopleinvolved with the development of advanced technologies shown to me by otherbeings.
